snippet.title: NEON WHITE | Gameplay Walkthrough
snippet.description:
Creative Director Ben Esposito talks about gameplay and other features in Neon White, a lightning fast first-person action game about exterminating demons in Heaven. Coming soon to Nintendo Switch and PC. Add it to your Steam wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1533420/?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=072921&utm_medium=directreach

You are White, an assassin handpicked from Hell to compete with other demon slayers for a chance to live permanently in Heaven. The other assassins seem familiar, though…did you know them in a past life? 

https://neonwhite.rip/

Developed by ANGEL MATRIX. Published by Annapurna Interactive.

© Annapurna Interactive, 2021
